main event: An Army officer observed a round, bright object emitting a fire trail over Camp Hood, Texas on March 31, 1949.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a basketball.,The sighting lasted for about 10 to 15 seconds.,The object faded from view at a distance of about 2,000 feet.,There was significant radio interference immediately following the sighting.,The sky was clear at the time of the observation.
sighted object: a round, bright object with a fire trail
